item.description:
Good Morning All:

Just called Unicorn and they do not reserve tee times. I will see everyone at the Club House at noon time. It is going to be a terrific day, about 60 or so, according to the weather on Channel 5 this morning. I look forward to seeing everyone there and for those who did not RSVP, come on down!!!

Thank you. Have a pleasant day. My cell number is 617-640-9634. I will be at the gym Sunday morning for a spin class but feel free to call me anytime after 7:00 am. Robin

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Golf at Unicorn in Stoneham, Massachusetts at noon time-meet at club house
